languages.text: "Милостью Бога-Императора я надзираю за административным аппаратом на планете и исполняю обязанности секретаря. Я также отвечаю за логистические операции, необходимые для снабжения планет династии фон Валанциус, и своевременную передачу податей официальным сборщикам Империума".

traits.locale_text: "Милостью Бога-Императора я надзираю за административным аппаратом на планете и исполняю обязанности секретаря при госпоже Вьятт. Ее Благородие губернатор ни разу не изъявила сомнения в моей профессиональной ценности".

languages.text: "By the grace of the God-Emperor, I oversee the administrative apparatus on the planet and serve as secretary. I am also responsible for the logistics related to supplying the planets of the von Valancius dynasty and the timely payment of tithes to the Imperium's official collectors."
languages.original_text: "Милостью Бога-Императора я надзираю за административным аппаратом на планете и исполняю обязанности секретаря. Я также отвечаю за логистические операции, необходимые для снабжения планет династии фон Валанциус, и своевременную передачу податей официальным сборщикам Империума".

traits.locale_text: "By the grace of the God-Emperor, I oversee the administrative apparatus on the planet and serve as secretary to Governor Vyatt. I am also responsible for the logistics related to supplying the planets of the von Valancius dynasty and the timely payment of tithes to the Imperium's official collectors."

"By the grace of the God-Emperor, I oversee the administrative apparatus on the planet and serve as secretary to Governor Vyatt. I am also responsible for the logistics related to supplying the planets of the von Valancius dynasty and the timely payment of tithes to the Imperium's official collectors."

"By the grace of the God-Emperor, I oversee the administrative apparatus on the planet and serve as secretary to Governor Vyatt. I am also responsible for the logistics related to supplying the planets of the von Valancius dynasty and the timely payment of tithes to the Imperium's official collectors."

"By the grace of the God-Emperor, I oversee the administrative apparatus on the planet and serve as secretary. I am also responsible for the logistics related to supplying the planets of the von Valancius dynasty and the timely payment of tithes to the Imperium's official collectors."

languages.text: “承蒙神皇的恩典，我负责监督这颗行星的行政机构，并担任这里的秘书。我还负责相关的后勤工作，负责为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的属地提供补给，并及时地向帝国官方征税官缴纳什一税。”
languages.original_text: "By the grace of the God-Emperor, I oversee the administrative apparatus on the planet and serve as secretary. I am also responsible for the logistics related to supplying the planets of the von Valancius dynasty and the timely payment of tithes to the Imperium's official collectors."

traits.locale_text: “承蒙神皇的恩典，我负责监督这颗行星的行政机构，并担任这里的秘书。我还负责相关的后勤工作，负责为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的属地提供补给，并及时地向帝国官方征税官缴纳什一税。”

languages.text: «Por gracia del Dios Emperador, superviso el aparato administrativo del planeta en función de secretario. Recae en mí también la responsabilidad sobre la logística relativa a los suministros de los planetas de la dinastía von Valancius y al pago puntual de diezmos a los recaudadores oficiales del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "By the grace of the God-Emperor, I oversee the administrative apparatus on the planet and serve as secretary. I am also responsible for the logistics related to supplying the planets of the von Valancius dynasty and the timely payment of tithes to the Imperium's official collectors."

traits.locale_text: «Por gracia del Dios Emperador, superviso el aparato administrativo del planeta en función de secretario. Recae en mí también la responsabilidad sobre la logística relativa a los suministros de los planetas de la dinastía von Valancius y al pago puntual de diezmos a los recaudadores oficiales del Imperium».

languages.text: 「神帝陛下のお慈悲により、この星の行政組織の監督および秘書業務に従事しております。フォン・ヴァランシウス朝所有惑星へ送る物流の管理と、帝国当局の徴税官への適切な納税も、私が行っています」
languages.original_text: "By the grace of the God-Emperor, I oversee the administrative apparatus on the planet and serve as secretary. I am also responsible for the logistics related to supplying the planets of the von Valancius dynasty and the timely payment of tithes to the Imperium's official collectors."

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下のお慈悲により、この星の行政組織の監督および秘書業務に従事しております。フォン・ヴァランシウス朝所有惑星へ送る物流の管理と、帝国当局の徴税官への適切な納税も、私が行っています」

languages.text: "Ich überwache dank der Gnade des Gottimperators den Verwaltungsapparat des Planeten und diene als Sekretär. Außerdem bin ich verantwortlich für die Logistik zur Versorgung der Planeten der Dynastie von Valancius und die rechtzeitige Begleichung des Zehnts bei den offiziellen Eintreibern des Imperiums."
languages.original_text: "By the grace of the God-Emperor, I oversee the administrative apparatus on the planet and serve as secretary. I am also responsible for the logistics related to supplying the planets of the von Valancius dynasty and the timely payment of tithes to the Imperium's official collectors."

traits.locale_text: "Ich überwache dank der Gnade des Gottimperators den Verwaltungsapparat des Planeten und diene als Sekretär. Außerdem bin ich verantwortlich für die Logistik zur Versorgung der Planeten der Dynastie von Valancius und die rechtzeitige Begleichung des Zehnts bei den offiziellen Eintreibern des Imperiums."

languages.text: « Par la grâce de l'Empereur, je supervise l'organe administratif de cette planète et remplis les fonctions de secrétaire. Je suis également responsable de la logistique liée à l'approvisionnement des planètes de la dynastie von Valancius et du versement des taxes aux percepteurs officiels de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "By the grace of the God-Emperor, I oversee the administrative apparatus on the planet and serve as secretary. I am also responsible for the logistics related to supplying the planets of the von Valancius dynasty and the timely payment of tithes to the Imperium's official collectors."

traits.locale_text: « Par la grâce de l'Empereur, je supervise l'organe administratif de cette planète et remplis les fonctions de secrétaire. Je suis également responsable de la logistique liée à l'approvisionnement des planètes de la dynastie von Valancius et du versement des taxes aux percepteurs officiels de l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator'un emriyle gezegendeki idari yapıyı denetliyor ve yazmanlık vazifesini yerine getiriyorum. Ayrıca von Valancius hanendanlığının gezegenlerinin tedarik yönetimi ile aşarların İmparatorluk'un resmî tahsildarlarına zamanında ödenmesinden de sorumluyum."
languages.original_text: "By the grace of the God-Emperor, I oversee the administrative apparatus on the planet and serve as secretary. I am also responsible for the logistics related to supplying the planets of the von Valancius dynasty and the timely payment of tithes to the Imperium's official collectors."

traits.locale_text: "Tanrı İmparator'un emriyle gezegendeki idari yapıyı denetliyor ve yazmanlık vazifesini yerine getiriyorum. Ayrıca von Valancius hanendanlığının gezegenlerinin tedarik yönetimi ile aşarların İmparatorluk'un resmî tahsildarlarına zamanında ödenmesinden de sorumluyum."
